item.title: Dagger2 in the Real World
item.description: Dagger and Dagger2 may be things you’ve heard of if you’re an Android developer. Dependency injection has been a hot topic for a while now. Often the examples you see are solving complex architectural problems, or are too trivial to demonstrate applicability. Let’s look at a real world example of how Dagger2 is used in Emergency AUS, and maybe spark some ideas for where Dagger could improve your existing code.
